creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
In preparation for repackaging component model, rules and receivers from log4j 1.3 for use by Chainsaw 
with log4j 1.2.x, a lot checkstyle and PMD reported issues should be resolved before branching the code.

creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
Committed revs 527629, 527630, 527671, 527682, 527771, 527986, 528091 against this bug.

As far as I know there were no intervening commits, so if you want to full list of diffs

svn diff -r527628:528091 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/logging/log4j/trunk

All changes should be strictly cosmetic (javadoc, final qualifiers, dead variables, etc) and not affect 
functionality.
